text: Brian Schwager (aka Ares Schwager) is an American musician and the guitarist from Rapcore band Downset. The 'Ares' nickname came from his days of playing the Dungeons & Dragons role playing game, where his character was called 'Ares' (also known as the Olympian God of War). == References == Category:American heavy metal guitarists Category:Living people Category:American male guitarists Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Brian Schwager
